result.execSummary:
The defendant Erick Lee Lomker was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Erick Lee Lomker is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Erick Lee Lomker was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court dismisses Counts 2 and 3.
Defendant to report to Probation by November 19, 2015 at 3:00 p.m.

 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot, ADA:  Micheal Nieskes. DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Erick Lee Lomker appeared. Includes 15CM409, 15CM628 and 15CM661. Case called at 3:39 pm. There is agreement. ADA Nieskes recites. No objection from Atty Harrelson. Count one in 15CM409  amended to be without the Domestic Abuse Enhancer. Court reviews constitutional rights with Def. Court finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for ameded count one in 15CM409 and count one in 15CM628 , Def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates Def guilty of amended count one in 15CM409 and count one in 15CM628. Court dismisses all other charges. Parties make sentencing arguments. Court orders

and _X_ SIGNATURE BOND:   _X_ Defendant guarantees compliance with the terms of this bond by pledging $2000.00 and understands that if the defendant does not comply with the terms of this bond, the bond will be forfeited and the defendant and/or surety may be ordered to pay the amount of the bond.

- Includes 15CM671 and 15CM628

- $500.00 Bond to be paid by Friday, November 20th, 2015

- Defendant to report to the St. Croix County Jail every Saturday and Sunday by 10:00 am to take a PBT test. 

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, M. Parent.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Defendant to Report to St. Croix County Jail for Fingerprints and Mugs by 9:15 am on 11/17/2015

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
Plea hearing at 11-17-2015 08:30 am
